mapper.insert: INSERT INTO codefolio.proj ( proj_seq, user, title, url, view ,stack, content, period, regDate,thumbnail ) VALUES ( (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(proj_seq), 0) + 1 FROM codefolio.proj A), #{user}, #{title}, #{url}, (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(view), 0) + 1 FROM codefolio.proj A), #{stack}, #{content}, #{period}, NOW(), #{thumbnail} )
mapper.update: UPDATE codefolio.proj SET user = #{user}, title = #{title}, url = #{url}, stack = #{stack}, content = #{content}, period = #{period}, thumbnail = #{thumbnail}, regDate = NOW() WHERE proj_seq = #{projSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT p.proj_seq, p.title, p.user, p.thumbnail FROM codefolio.proj AS p LEFT OUTER JOIN codefolio.like AS l ON l.proj_seq = p.proj_seq WHERE l.proj_seq = p.proj_seq AND l.user_id = #{userId} LIMIT #{criteria.amount} OFFSET #{criteria.startNum}
SELECT proj_seq, title, user, likes, thumbnail FROM codefolio.proj ORDER BY likes DESC LIMIT #{criteria.amount} OFFSET #{criteria.startNum}
